original_text: And thus did Hezekiah throughout all Judah, and wrought that which was good and right and truth before the Lord his God.
korean_text: 히스기야가 온 유다에 이같이 행하되 그의 하나님 여호와 보시기에 선과 정의와 진실함으로 행하였으니

sentences.original_text: And thus did Hezekiah throughout all Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야가 온 유다에서 이와 같이 행하였으며

sentences.original_text: and wrought that which was good
